description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1949年至1970年代设立的地方行政管理机构，作为省、自治区人民政府的派出机构，管理下辖的县、自治县和市。
description.en: A local administrative management agency established in the People's Republic of China from 1949 to the 1970s, acting as a dispatched agency of the provincial and autonomous regional people's governments to administer counties, autonomous counties, and cities under its jurisdiction.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，是中国的执政当局。
description.en: A country in East Asia, it is the governing authority of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一级行政区划及其地方政府。
description.en: A first-level administrative division and its local government in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级民族自治地方及其地方政府。
description.en: A provincial-level ethnic autonomous area and its local government in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一种县级行政区。
description.en: A type of county-level administrative division in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一种县级行政区。
description.en: A type of county-level administrative division in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一种行政区划，此处的市指由专区行政公署管理的县级市。
description.en: An administrative division in the People's Republic of China; the cities referred to here are county-level cities administered by the special administrative office.

description.zh-cn: 专区行政公署的最高行政长官职位。
description.en: The position of the chief executive officer of a Special Administrative Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期行政督察区的行政管理机构，是专区行政公署的前身。
description.en: The administrative body of an Administrative Inspectorate Area during the period of the Republic of China on the mainland, and the predecessor of the Special Administrative Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的中央人民政府。
description.en: The central people's government during the early years of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1950年由政务院通过的规定省级政府组织的法律文件。
description.en: A legal document passed by the Government Administration Council in 1950 that stipulated the organization of provincial governments.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1958年至1961年间试图利用国家力量快速实现工业化和集体化的社会政治运动。
description.en: A socio-political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1958 to 1961 that aimed to rapidly achieve industrialization and collectivization using state power.

description.zh-cn: 1958年中华人民共和国中央政府首次向地方政府下放权力的政策运动。
description.en: The 1958 policy movement in which the central government of the People's Republic of China decentralized power to local governments for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间中国各级政权的临时领导机构。地区的革命委员会取代了专区行政公署。
description.en: Provisional organs of power at all levels in China during the Cultural Revolution. The prefectural revolutionary committees replaced the special administrative offices.

description.zh-cn: 专区行政公署的后继机构类型，在文化大革命结束后取代了地区革命委员会。
description.en: The successor type of agency to the special administrative office, which replaced the prefectural revolutionary committees after the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 专区行政公署是省人民政府的派出机构。
description.en: The Special Administrative Office was a dispatched agency of the provincial people's government.

description.zh-cn: 专区行政公署是自治区人民政府的派出机构。
description.en: The Special Administrative Office was a dispatched agency of the autonomous regional people's government.

description.zh-cn: 专区行政公署管理县级行政单位。
description.en: The Special Administrative Office administered county-level administrative units.

description.zh-cn: 专区行政公署管理自治县。
description.en: The Special Administrative Office administered autonomous counties.

description.zh-cn: 专区行政公署管理县级市。
description.en: The Special Administrative Office administered county-level cities.

description.zh-cn: 行政专员是专区行政公署的最高行政长官。
description.en: The Administrative Commissioner was the chief executive officer of the Special Administrative Office.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中华人民共和国成立后，将中华民国大陆时期的“行政督察专员公署”改设为“专区行政公署”。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949, the 'Administrative Inspectorate Commissioner's Office' from the ROC mainland period was reorganized into the 'Special Administrative Office'.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中华人民共和国成立后，“行政督察专员公署”被“专区行政公署”取代。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949, the 'Administrative Inspectorate Commissioner's Office' was replaced by the 'Special Administrative Office'.

description.zh-cn: 1950年1月，政务院通过了《省人民政府组织通则》。
description.en: In January 1950, the Government Administration Council passed the 'Organizational Regulations for Provincial People's Governments'.

description.zh-cn: 该通则第13条规定专员公署为省人民政府委员会之派出机关，成为专员区公署制推行最直接和明确的法律依据。
description.en: Article 13 of these regulations stipulated that the commissioner's office was a dispatched agency of the provincial people's government committee, becoming the most direct and clear legal basis for the implementation of the special administrative office system.

description.zh-cn: 1958年，伴随着大跃进，中央政府首次向地方分权。
description.en: In 1958, along with the Great Leap Forward, the central government decentralized power to local authorities for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 由于1958年中央政府向地方下放权力，专区行政公署的权力得以扩张。
description.en: Due to the decentralization of power from the central government to local authorities in 1958, the power of the Special Administrative Office was expanded.

description.zh-cn: 在20世纪60年代末期开始的文化大革命期间，专区行政公署被地区革命委员会取代。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, which began in the late 1960s, the Special Administrative Offices were replaced by Prefectural Revolutionary Committees.

description.zh-cn: 在20世纪60年代末期开始的文化大革命期间，地区革命委员会取代了专区行政公署，成为地方行政机构。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, which began in the late 1960s, Prefectural Revolutionary Committees replaced the Special Administrative Offices as the local administrative bodies.
